mentionedBy.name: Squarespace
mentionedBy.notes: Most flexible CMS-driven option with thousands of plugins and themes. Self-hosted solution providing complete site ownership and freedom to make changes. Offers superior SEO flexibility and customization compared to Squarespace.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Dominant CMS platform powering over 43% of all websites by 2020. WordPress.org offered maximum flexibility and customization through 59,000+ plugins but required more technical knowledge than Wix's no-code interface.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Dominant CMS platform powering 43.4% of all websites. Open-source platform with 59,000+ free and paid plugins offering unlimited customization. Far more flexible than Wix but required more technical knowledge. Received AI-powered enhancements in 2024 for quicker store setups and improved payment/shipping integration.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Most flexible and powerful alternative to Wix as open-source CMS powering every fourth website globally. WordPress.org offers unmatched customization with thousands of themes, 59,000+ plugins, and complete website control. Professionals worldwide contribute daily. More powerful for designers, developers, and anyone needing 100% customized projects that can scale over years. Requires more technical knowledge than Wix but offers far greater long-term flexibility.
